name: seerdb
description: Headless CLI database explorer for AI agents

scripts.build: bun run build:bundle && bun run build:compile
scripts.build:bundle: mkdir -p dist && cp AGENTS.md dist/ && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --minify --external:bun:sqlite
scripts.build:compile: mkdir -p dist && cp AGENTS.md dist/ && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/sdb --target bun --minify --external bun:sqlite
